testDataWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Post Express Test Data Limitation
testDataWarning.description: Post Express test database does not contain addresses with PostojiAdresa=true. The API works correctly (returns PAK code and postal code), but all addresses are marked as non-existent. This is a limitation of Post Express test environment.

issuesAlert.title: Attention
issuesAlert.description: These tests work but have known issues or limitations. See each test description for details.

issueDescriptions.tx11: API returns incorrect data when using Serbian language (sr-Latn-RS)
issueDescriptions.tx9: Post Express API error: 'Podaci adrese nisu prosleƒëeni!' (Address data not provided). API requires additional address parameters that are not documented.
issueDescriptions.tx73Cod: Post Express API deserialization error in Otkupnina.Iznos field. Cannot serialize COD amount correctly.
issueDescriptions.tx73ParcelLocker: Post Express API returns 400 Bad Request. Parcel locker functionality appears to be unavailable in test environment.

about.title: About test suite
about.description: This is a complete test suite for Post Express WSP B2B API integration. Each test provides interactive form with pre-filled values and displays request/response data in real-time.
